entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
